PHRASE.LANG: This little flying pink creature will always keep an eye on you! Watch him doze off as he takes a nap on your shoulder... Can you hear him snore? [#Legal]
Cette petite créature rose volante gardera toujours un oeil sur vous! Regardez-la s'assoupir sur votre épaule... L'entendez-vous ronfler? [#Legal]
Diese kleine rosenrot Kreatur wird immer Sie vervolgen! Sie wird auf Ihre Schulter schlafen... Können Sie hören, wie sie schnarcht?[#Legal]
Questa piccola creatura rosa volante terra’ sempre un occhio su di voi. Guardalo mentre si addormenta sulla tua spalla……..Lo senti russare? [#Legal]
Esta pequeña criatura volante rosa siempre mantendra un ojo sobre ti! Observa como se pone a dormir encima de tu hombro ... ¿Puedes oírle roncar? [#Legal]
This little flying pink creature will always keep an eye on you! Watch him doze off as he takes a nap on your shoulder... Can you hear him snore? [#Legal]
This little flying pink creature will always keep an eye on you! Watch him doze off as he takes a nap on your shoulder... Can you hear him snore? [#Legal]
